subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky is benefiting from the versatility and experience of Cauley-Stein, a junior, though no player deserves too large a portion of the credit for the Wildcats’ success.
snippet: Kentucky is benefiting from the versatility and experience of Cauley-Stein, a junior, though no player deserves too large a portion of the credit for the Wildcats’ success.
